dict.acceptation: 计算，盘算；估计；计算的结果；深思熟虑，慎重的计划；

sent.orig: The type and number of grid in numerical calculation has certain effect on the calculation.
sent.trans: 数值计算的网格类型、网格数对计算有一定影响。

sent.orig: The monitoring and the result of calculation are in agreement, so the calculation model is reasonable.
sent.trans: 现场监测数据和数值分析结果基本一致，表明采用的计算模型是合理的。

sent.orig: Introduce multistage calculation program of PRO-II distillation is adopted for the simulation calculation of batch distillation.
sent.trans: 介绍应用PRO-II精馏多级计算程序进行间歇精馏的模拟计算。

sent.orig: The mechanics calculation of electrical wire is the most important calculation on HV overhead transmission lines.
sent.trans: 电线力学计算是高压架空输电线路力学计算中最重要的计算。

sent.orig: Represents the friction calculation chart of the duct for graphic calculation during project design.
sent.trans: 给出了柔性风管完全展开时的阻力计算图，可供工程设计时使用。
